video_prompt: An anime character's silver pigtails sway. Her eyes track subtle movements. Her elaborate dress billows and ruffles. Accessories glint as she shifts. Decorative items at her feet subtly move, suggesting a lively tea party. The background sparkles and clouds drift.
image_prompt: Full-body anime portrait of a charming female character with long silver pigtails tied with orange bows and gems, amber eyes, and fair skin. She wears an elaborate, multi-layered orange and white Victorian/Rococo-inspired dress with a fitted bodice, puffed sleeves, ruffled cuffs, a large waist bow, and a full layered skirt with white ruffles and gold detailing. Her accessories include an amber gem necklace, matching earrings and bracelets, and a garter with a hanging strap. She wears thigh-high orange lace-up boots with bows. Surrounding her feet are tea party elements: a white teapot, a bowl of red berries, lidded containers, and gift boxes. The background is a soft peachy-orange with white clouds and sparkles. The scene evokes fantasy and elegance with a vibrant orange and cream palette, highly detailed with intricate lace and fabric folds.
refined_video_prompt: Silver pigtails sway dynamically. Her eyes subtly track unseen movements. The elaborate dress billows and ruffles with graceful motion. Accessories glint and catch light as she shifts. Decorative tea party items at her feet subtly move and jostle. The background shimmers with sparkling light as clouds drift lazily.
